item.title: Singular Value Decomposition
item.description: Unitary matrices and the Singular Value Decomposition (SVD) are two important concepts in linear algebra. In order to fully understand these concepts, we will need to first discuss orthogonality. Most materials are converted in Advanced Linear Algebra: Foundations to Frontiers taught by professor Robert van de Geijn . This is a brief summary over the important concepts covered in Chapter 2
